#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Tell if Something Is Gum
#Text=Often , people everywhere find themselves faced with a deceptively simple question : is this gum ?
#Text=It is a question that can arise anywhere , whether it be on the bottom of your shoe , the handle of your locker at school , or even in your hair while you lie in bed at night .
#Text=These steps will provide you with all you need to know about how to tell if something is gum .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Do n't make assumptions .
#Text=Arrogance has been the downfall of many otherwise intelligent people -- do n't get yourself into trouble by assuming something is or is n't gum .
#Text=But use your common sense .
#Text=Only if something has the general appearance of gum do these instructions become necessary .
#Text=Before taking any risky action yourself , ask a friend or relative to help determine whether what you 're dealing with is gum .
#Text=If no one is available , try getting a pet to eat the substance and see how your pet reacts .
#Text=If you 've tried these and you still ca n't tell , proceed to Step Two .
#Text=Smell it .
#Text=Usually , the aroma of a substance can tell you whether or not something is gum .
#Text=If it smells minty , sweet , or , even sometimes fruity , it is quite possible that it is gum .
#Text=However , this is not a definitive test .
#Text=While most things that are not gum do not smell like gum , it is quite possible that the smell has simply faded .
#Text=In fact , if gum is particularly old , it could have no smell at all .
#Text=Do not be ashamed if your nose is insufficient for performing this test ; John Quincy Adams had no sense of smell at all .
#Text=He was rarely photographed from the waist down for this very reason .
#Text=With such a great leader for an example , there is no reason your inability to smell should make you feel inadequate .
#Text=This is when Step
#Text=Three comes into play .
#Text=Feel it .
#Text=If the substance is soft and malleable , yet slightly sticky , the chances of it being gum will greatly increase .
#Text=But be careful !
#Text=Remember our mantra from Step One : guessing makes an ass out of you and me .
#Text=Sometimes , Silly Putty will have these same properties , yet it is still not gum .
#Text=If you are still unsure , proceed to the last step .
#Text=It is said that Harrison Ford used this test on the set of his classic movie " Air Force One " in a particularly trying conundrum of whether or not something was gum .
#Text=Taste it .
#Text=Truly , this is the final test of whether or not something is gum .
#Text=There is no denying the unmistakable flavor of this precious sap bestowed upon us by the red-skinned savages of early America ( the scientific name of the tree being Manilkara zapota ) .
#Text=This satisfying and occasionally delicious trial will put to rest all apprehensions , rumors , and myths surrounding whether or not something is gum .
